TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit X509Certificate2UI extends System.Object
public ref class X509Certificate2UI abstract sealed

summary.span: 顯示可允許您選取和檢視 X.509 憑證的使用者介面對話方塊。

span.span: Displays user interface dialogs that allow you to select and view X.509 certificates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的方法存在的使用者介面對話方塊顯示 X.509 憑證的詳細的資訊，或允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證之 X.509 憑證的集合中的類別。Use the methods of the class to present user interface dialogs that display detailed information about an X.509 certificate or allow users to select one or more certificates from a collection of X.509 certificates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示使用者介面對話方塊選取和檢視的 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

summary.span: 顯示其中包含 X.509 憑證之屬性及其相關聯憑證鏈結的對話方塊。

span.span: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會顯示具有指定的 X.509 憑證的詳細資訊的對話方塊。This method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate. 此對話方塊包含用於安裝或複製憑證的按鈕。The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.

param.span: 要顯示的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to display.

span.span: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會顯示對話方塊，指定的 X.509 憑證的詳細資訊。The method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate. 此對話方塊包含用於安裝或複製憑證的按鈕。The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示使用者介面對話方塊選取和檢視的 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates. MemberSignature.Value: public static void DisplayCertificate (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, IntPtr hwndParent);
.method public static hidebysig void DisplayCertificate(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate, native int hwndParent) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DisplayCertificate (certificate As X509Certificate2, hwndParent As IntPtr)
public: static void DisplayCertificate(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^ certificate, IntPtr hwndParent);

param.name: certificate
param.span: 要顯示的 X.509 憑證。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to display.

param.name: hwndParent
param.span: 要用於顯示對話之父視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: A handle to the parent window to use for the display dialog.

summary.span: 使用父視窗的控制代碼來顯示其中包含 X.509 憑證之屬性和其相關聯憑證鏈結的對話方塊。

span.span: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain using a handle to a parent window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會顯示對話方塊，指定的 X.509 憑證的詳細資訊。The method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate. 這個方法可以用來建立巢狀的對話方塊，顯示憑證資訊。This method can be used to nest dialog boxes that display certificate information. 此對話方塊包含用於安裝或複製憑證的按鈕。The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter is invalid.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 顯示對話方塊，以供從憑證集合中選取 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要以手動方式選取 使用對話方塊中的 X.509 憑證的使用者，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box. 如果不不需要任何使用者互動，使用方法。If no user interaction is required, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection SelectFromCollection (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates, string title, string message, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection SelectFromCollection(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates, string title, string message, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag) cil managed

param.name: certificates
param.span: 要從中選取的 X.509 憑證集合。

span.span: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
The title of the dialog box.

param.name: message
param.span: 引導使用者的描述性訊息。

span.span: A descriptive message to guide the user.

param.span: 訊息會顯示在對話方塊中。

param.name: selectionFlag
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定是否允許單一選取或是多重選取。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.

summary.span: 顯示對話方塊，以供從憑證集合中選取 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.
An object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，如果您需要以手動方式選取 使用對話方塊中的 X.509 憑證的使用者。Use the method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box. 如果不不需要任何使用者互動，使用方法。If no user interaction is required, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示使用者介面對話方塊選取和檢視的 X.509 憑證。The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates.
